mapper.insert: insert into meeting_participation(participation_seq, meetingboard_seq, mentee_email, mentee_name, mentor_email, mentor_name, participation_address, participation_question) values(participation_seq.nextval,#{meetingboard_seq},#{mentee_email},#{mentee_name},#{mentor_email},#{mentor_name},#{participation_address},#{participation_question})
mapper.select: select p.participation_seq, p.meetingboard_seq, p.mentee_email, p.mentee_name, p.mentor_email, p.mentor_name, m.meetingboard_price, m.job_code, m.meetingboard_title, m.meetingboard_state from meeting_participation p, meetingboard m where p.meetingboard_seq = m.meetingboard_seq and p.mentee_email=#{mentee_email} and p.participation_state = 0 order by p.participation_seq asc
mapper.insert: insert into meeting_order(order_id, order_price, mentee_email, mentee_name, mentee_tel, meetingboard_seq, participation_seq) values(#{order_id},#{order_price},#{mentee_email},#{mentee_name},#{mentee_tel},#{meetingboard_seq},#{participation_seq})
mapper.update: update meeting_participation set participation_state = 1 where participation_seq = #{participation_seq}
mapper.select: select count(*) from meeting_order where meetingboard_seq = #{meetingboard_seq}
select meetingboard_count from meetingboard where meetingboard_seq = #{meetingboard_seq}
mapper.update: update meetingboard set meetingboard_state = 1 where meetingboard_seq = #{meetingboard_seq}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select m.job_code, m.meetingboard_title, m.meetingboard_day, m.meetingboard_price, o.order_id, o.order_date, o.order_price, o.mentee_email, o.mentee_name, o.mentee_tel, o.meetingboard_seq, o.participation_seq from meetingboard m, meeting_order o where m.meetingboard_seq = o.meetingboard_seq and o.mentee_email=#{member_email} order by o.participation_seq desc)tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}
select count(*) from meeting_order where mentee_email=#{member_email}
